text: Teddybears (formerly Teddybears STHLM) are a Swedish band formed in 1991, known for mixing pop, rock, hip-hop, electronica, reggae, punk and multiple other genres. ==Members== * Patrik Arve – Synthesizers, vocals, vocoder, bass, programming, percussion, keyboards * Joakim Åhlund – Bass guitar, bass, programming, percussion, keyboards, backing vocals, guitar * Klas Åhlund – Guitars, bass, programming, percussion, keyboards, backing vocals ===Former members=== * Erik Olsson – Drums, vibraphone * Glenn Sundell – Drums Category:Alternative rock bands Category:Swedish rock music groups Category:Punk bands
title: Teddybears
